channel.title: Runserver error... help plz
channel.description:
when i go on compiler and ru it it sez no errors but when i click on runserver it says 'starting testscape on 0.0.0.0:43594' but then it come up with this:
'exeption in thread "main" java.lang.numberFormatExeption: For Input String: "2" At java.lang.NumberFormatExeption.forInputString(NumberFormatExeption.java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497 at shopHandler.loadShops(shophandler.java:117) at server.main(server.java:28)'
Help plz? :confused:
